sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2019 Solstice of Heroes event.

displayProperties.description: Complete daily or weekly challenges, defeat enemies in strike playlists using a subclass that matches the [Arc] / [Solar] / [Void] Day, and, as a team, defeat opposing Guardians in the Crucible or Gambit using Void weapons.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Strides (Renewed)
